name: End Days from the Beginning
description:
F4: Fullscreen, F5: Display options (select or deselect "Allow Uneven Pixel Sizes" to toggle widescreen)

A submission for the Themed Horror Game Jam. A classic style rpg which takes inspiration from SMT for apocalyptic and dark imagery. Navigate an underground laboratory in hopes that freedom may come with a chance to save humanity.

Content Warning: While this game does not contain any gore nor intense violence (nothing beyond what most rpgs feature), it does feature 4 child protagonists in a violent scenario. Were this game to become a full release, there would be a time skip in which they become older later on.

Though most of the visual assets are original, the music, sound effects, and battle animations are all part of rpg maker 2k3's included assets. I was also originally planning on adding at least 1 male character and 1 nonbinary character, but implementing the animations for the existing characters was already time consuming enough so I decided to hold off.

Please let me know if there are any issues which should be corrected.
